mapper.select: SELECT ss.special_sale_code as specialSaleCode, ss.product_code as productCode, ss.special_sale_price as specialSalePrice, ss.start_date as startDate, ss.special_sale_per as specialSalePer, p.product_name as productName, p.product_id as productId, pr.price_original as priceOriginal, pr.price_selling as priceSelling, i.image_url as imageUrl FROM special_sale ss JOIN product p ON ss.product_code = p.product_code LEFT JOIN price pr ON p.product_code = pr.product_code LEFT JOIN image i ON p.product_code = i.product_code AND i.image_type = 'title' WHERE ss.start_date = #{startDate}
